name: Tarot Torment
description:
Click cards to select, Click again to play.

Draw cards in search of the Exits! Collect 3 Exits and End your turn to escape!

Lose all your hearts, or run out of cards and the Ghosts will keep you forever!

Tarot Torment, the solo card game where you never play alone.
Clicking on the crystal ball can reveal the number of cards remaining in the deck,
